programme.title: جو هارت
programme.desc: يجلس جو هارت للحديث عن وقته في مانشستر سيتي، ومسيرته في إنجلترا، وتحديات حراسة المرمى على أعلى مستوى في هذه السلسلة الأصلية من beIN Stories، يتحدث مايكل سيلفستر إلى أساطير اللعبة حول اللحظات الحاسمة في حياتهم المهنية.

programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. programme.title: Carlos ALCARAZ (ESP) [1] vs Jannik SINNER (ITA) [2] - Nitto ATP Finals Turin - 2025
programme.desc: Set up No.1 Alcaraz vs No.2 Sinner. Pre-match, Alcaraz leads H2H 10–6 (hard 7–3, clay 3–1; Sinner edges grass 2–0). Indoor hard favors first-strike tennis and aggressive returns. Expect razor-thin margins as the season’s top two chase year-end supremacy and another chapter in a rivalry built on pace, precision, and momentum swings.

programme.title: Arturo COELLO ESP Agustin TAPIA ARG vs Chingotto/Galan - Final Men - FIP World Cup Pairs Padel - Kuw
programme.desc: The inaugural FIP World Cup – Pairs in Kuwait (Nov 3-9 2025) crowns the first-ever “FIP World Champion” pair in men’s and women’s categories. Winners receive 2,000 FIP ranking points and a combined prize pool of over €1 million, equally shared between the men’s and women’s draws. Kuwait builds on its success hosting the Premier Padel P1 earlier in the season.

programme.title: Winner QF1 vs Winner QF2 (SF1) - Davis Cup (Final 8) 2025 - Bologna Fiere
programme.desc: The 2025 Davis Cup Final 8 runs 18–23 Nov at SuperTennis Arena, Bologna Fiere (indoor hard). Eight nations—host Italy plus seven Sept qualifiers (e.g., Germany, France, Austria, Argentina)—play single-day ties of two singles and, if needed, one doubles (best-of-three rubbers). Italy, the 2023–24 champion, chases a three-peat; stars such as Alcaraz, Zverev and Musetti are expected.

programme.desc: Premier League stars select their dream team from the best they played with or against.

programme.title: Longines Global Champions Tour 2025 - Riyadh
programme.desc: The Longines Global Champions Tour is an annual pre-eminent individual show jumping series that comprises up to 15 rounds of competition hosted around the world. It brings together the top 30 riders in the FEI Jumping World Rankings. It was founded in 2006 by the Olympic gold medalist Jan Tops

programme.title: Practice 3 - F1 Las Vegas Grand Prix - 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Formula 1 Las Vegas Grand Prix will light up the famous Las Vegas Strip for one of the most spectacular events of the season. Set against the city’s dazzling skyline, the race will combine speed, strategy, and spectacle as drivers battle under the lights on the fast, 6.2 km street circuit. With championship stakes high and the unique atmosphere of Vegas, it promises an unforgettable night of Formula 1 action.

programme.title: Limoges vs Nîmes - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: PALESTINE, ONE JERSEY, MANY ROOTS
programme.desc: Story of the Palestinian national football team, a team that is far more than the sum of its players. Separated by borders, by checkpoints, and exile, the tells is inspiring “One Jersey…Many Roots” them is a single jersey, a shared dream, and a deep sense of responsibility to players come from every corner of Palestine and from communities scattered across the globe. What unites represent their people on and off the pitch that Palestine endures. This is not just in every match, they carry not just a ball but the weight of history, identity and hope. Fot their supporters, each goal is a voice, each victory a declaration. Football it s a living emblem of unity, resilience and the unbreakable b

programme.title: Morocco .. Champion of World Cup U20
programme.desc: Morocco capped off a historic run in Chile on October 2025, beating Argentina 2-0 to take home the trophy at the Under-20 World Cup. The result marked a first World Cup win for Morocco at any age-group level in the country's history. Watch best moments of this achievement exclusive on beIN SPORTS.

programme.title: Al Duhail vs Al Ahli - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W10
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: FIFA World Cup 2026 - PlayOff Tournament and European Play Off Draws
programme.desc: FIFA World Cup 2026™ Play-Off Tournament and European Play-Off Draws The final pathways to the game-changing FIFA World Cup 2026™ will be mapped out when the draw for the FIFA World Cup 2026™ Play-Off Tournament and the European Play-Off draw takes place at the Home of FIFA in Zurich, Switzerland. The draws will define the routes the 22 competing nations – six via the Play-Off Tournament and 16 through European Play-Off matches – will need to successfully navigate to seal a spot at the first-ever 48-team FIFA World Cup™, which will be staged in Canada, Mexico and the United States from Thursday, 11 June to Sunday, 19 July 2026.

programme.title: PALESTINE, ONE JERSEY, MANY ROOTS
programme.desc: Story of the Palestinian national football team, a team that is far more than the sum of its players. Separated by borders, by checkpoints, and exile, the tells is inspiring “One Jersey…Many Roots” them is a single jersey, a shared dream, and a deep sense of responsibility to players come from every corner of Palestine and from communities scattered across the globe. What unites represent their people on and off the pitch that Palestine endures. This is not just in every match, they carry not just a ball but the weight of history, identity and hope. Fot their supporters, each goal is a voice, each victory a declaration. Football it s a living emblem of unity, resilience and the unbreakable b

programme.title: Practice 3 - F1 Las Vegas Grand Prix - 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Formula 1 Las Vegas Grand Prix will light up the famous Las Vegas Strip for one of the most spectacular events of the season. Set against the city’s dazzling skyline, the race will combine speed, strategy, and spectacle as drivers battle under the lights on the fast, 6.2 km street circuit. With championship stakes high and the unique atmosphere of Vegas, it promises an unforgettable night of Formula 1 action.

programme.title: Carlos ALCARAZ (ESP) [1] vs Jannik SINNER (ITA) [2] - Nitto ATP Finals Turin - 2025
programme.desc: Set up No.1 Alcaraz vs No.2 Sinner. Pre-match, Alcaraz leads H2H 10–6 (hard 7–3, clay 3–1; Sinner edges grass 2–0). Indoor hard favors first-strike tennis and aggressive returns. Expect razor-thin margins as the season’s top two chase year-end supremacy and another chapter in a rivalry built on pace, precision, and momentum swings.

programme.title: Arturo COELLO ESP Agustin TAPIA ARG vs Chingotto/Galan - Final Men - FIP World Cup Pairs Padel - Kuw
programme.desc: The inaugural FIP World Cup – Pairs in Kuwait (Nov 3-9 2025) crowns the first-ever “FIP World Champion” pair in men’s and women’s categories. Winners receive 2,000 FIP ranking points and a combined prize pool of over €1 million, equally shared between the men’s and women’s draws. Kuwait builds on its success hosting the Premier Padel P1 earlier in the season.

programme.title: Winner QF1 vs Winner QF2 (SF1) - Davis Cup (Final 8) 2025 - Bologna Fiere
programme.desc: The 2025 Davis Cup Final 8 runs 18–23 Nov at SuperTennis Arena, Bologna Fiere (indoor hard). Eight nations—host Italy plus seven Sept qualifiers (e.g., Germany, France, Austria, Argentina)—play single-day ties of two singles and, if needed, one doubles (best-of-three rubbers). Italy, the 2023–24 champion, chases a three-peat; stars such as Alcaraz, Zverev and Musetti are expected.

Eight nations—host Italy plus seven Sept qualifiers (e.g., Germany, France, Austria, Argentina)—play single-day ties of two singles and, if needed, one doubles (best-of-three rubbers). Italy, the 2023–24 champion, chases a three-peat; stars such as Alcaraz, Zverev and Musetti are expected.

programme.title: PALESTINE, ONE JERSEY, MANY ROOTS
programme.desc: Story of the Palestinian national football team, a team that is far more than the sum of its players. What unites represent their people on and off the pitch that Palestine endures. This is not just in every match, they carry not just a ball but the weight of history, identity and hope. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: Morocco vs Brazil - FIFA Under 17 World Cup Qatar 2025 - Quater Final's
programme.desc: 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup The 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup will be held in Qatar from the 3rd through until the 27th November. It will be the first of the five consecutive U-17 World Cups held in Qatar. This edition will be the first to be played in the 48-team format instead of the previous biennial 24-team tournaments.

programme.title: Limoges vs Nîmes - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: PALESTINE, ONE JERSEY, MANY ROOTS
programme.desc: Story of the Palestinian national football team, a team that is far more than the sum of its players. Separated by borders, by checkpoints, and exile, the tells is inspiring “One Jersey…Many Roots” them is a single jersey, a shared dream, and a deep sense of responsibility to players come from every corner of Palestine and from communities scattered across the globe. What unites represent their people on and off the pitch that Palestine endures. This is not just in every match, they carry not just a ball but the weight of history, identity and hope. Fot their supporters, each goal is a voice, each victory a declaration. Football it s a living emblem of unity, resilience and the unbreakable b

programme.title: Morocco .. Champion of World Cup U20
programme.desc: Morocco capped off a historic run in Chile on October 2025, beating Argentina 2-0 to take home the trophy at the Under-20 World Cup. The result marked a first World Cup win for Morocco at any age-group level in the country's history. Watch best moments of this achievement exclusive on beIN SPORTS.

programme.title: FIFA World Cup 2026 - PlayOff Tournament and European Play Off Draws
programme.desc: FIFA World Cup 2026™ Play-Off Tournament and European Play-Off Draws The final pathways to the game-changing FIFA World Cup 2026™ will be mapped out when the draw for the FIFA World Cup 2026™ Play-Off Tournament and the European Play-Off draw takes place at the Home of FIFA in Zurich, Switzerland. The draws will define the routes the 22 competing nations – six via the Play-Off Tournament and 16 through European Play-Off matches – will need to successfully navigate to seal a spot at the first-ever 48-team FIFA World Cup™, which will be staged in Canada, Mexico and the United States from Thursday, 11 June to Sunday, 19 July 2026.

programme.title: PALESTINE, ONE JERSEY, MANY ROOTS
programme.desc: Story of the Palestinian national football team, a team that is far more than the sum of its players. Separated by borders, by checkpoints, and exile, the tells is inspiring “One Jersey…Many Roots” them is a single jersey, a shared dream, and a deep sense of responsibility to players come from every corner of Palestine and from communities scattered across the globe. What unites represent their people on and off the pitch that Palestine endures. This is not just in every match, they carry not just a ball but the weight of history, identity and hope. programme.title: Um Salal vs Al Rayyan - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W10
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.desc: The 2025 Formula 1 Las Vegas Grand Prix will light up the famous Las Vegas Strip for one of the most spectacular events of the season. With championship stakes high and the unique atmosphere of Vegas, it promises an unforgettable night of Formula 1 action.

Set against the city’s dazzling skyline, the race will combine speed, strategy, and spectacle as drivers battle under the lights on the fast, 6.2 km street circuit. With championship stakes high and the unique atmosphere of Vegas, it promises an unforgettable night of Formula 1 action.
